amendatorysection.chaptername: State University, State Colleges, And Postsecondary Education
amendatorysection.catchline: Inaugural authorization to operate; provisional authorization to operate; when applicable.
amendatorysection.para: A school not yet in operation when its application for authorization to operate is filed may not begin operation until receipt of authorization. The authorization shall be an inaugural authorization valid for one year and upon showing to the satisfaction of the commissioner that it has fully complied with sections 85-1611 to 85-1615, the school will be eligible for a regular authorization. The commissioner may issue provisional authorization to operate containing such limitations as to time, procedures, functions, or other conditions as the commissioner may deem necessary.
